original_text: The descendants of Makir son of Manasseh went to Gilead, captured it and drove out the Amorites who were there.
korean_text: 므낫세의 아들 마길의 자손은 가서 길르앗을 쳐서 빼앗고 거기 있는 아모리인을 쫓아내매

sentences.original_text: The descendants of Makir son of Manasseh went to Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세의 아들 마길의 자손들이 길르앗으로 갔는데

sentences.original_text: and drove out the Amorites who were there
